job.title: Data Engineer
job.description: DESCRIPTION:              •	These contingent workers will work closely with full-time research scientists and software engineers who are leading •	computer vision research projects to ensure that the process runs smoothly, and that data annotation quality remains high to •	train state-of-the-art machine learning models. Duties include: •	Data wrangling: writing data pipelines to upload annotations automatically; running existing ML models on large volumes of •	data; ad-hoc data analysis / visualization  Annotation task and vendor management:  •	creating data annotation guidelines; curating ideal “gold standard” examples for annotators. •	managing back-and-forth communications with annotators; reviewing annotation quality to identify themes and •	relaying appropriate feedback to annotation vendors.  Skills required: •	SQL, Python, Linux command line (Bash) •	Very high attention to detail for managing large, complex annotation efforts •	Good written communication skills to coordinate with annotators and team members •	2+ years’ work experience, including experience working with customer teams  Top must-have HARD skills: •	SQL and Python is a need •	Linux command line  Top 3 good-to-have skills: •	Great communication •	Understanding of AI models would be great  Interview Loop/Process •	2 coding interviews and 1 general interview •	PDF homework-offline analysis, will submit the answers along with their resume
